diluted 0.61$ 0.65$ 0.66$ 1.25$ 1.28$ Shares used in per share calculation - diluted 252 252 253 252 254 2 2 Two Fiscal Quarters Ended (1) A reconciliation of the non-GAAP measures presented above to the most directly comparable GAAP financial data appears on the next page. These non-GAAP measures are provided in addition to and not as a substitute for measures of financial performance prepared in accordance with GAAP. The financial summary excludes amortization of intangible assets, share-based compensation, restructuring charges and acquisition-related costs.
